subject: [YouTrack, Updated] Issue codio-6341: My Units
text:
Improvement was updated by Joel Moss in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 12:27.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6341 >codio-6341< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6341 > My Units Created by Joel Moss                                                                                   
Most students do not start with real projects for quite a while. For this reason, we should not show projects by default, but Units.                                                                                                              
Create a new main menu item called "My Units". When clicked, this should show a list of the current user's Units. This list should have no tabs, as it will show only the current user's started Units. Sorting and search options should remain. 
Each Unit in this list should also show the Unit's image. If there are no unit for the current user, show thus default message "You have not started any units yet. Feel free to browse [our courses]() first."                                   
Additionally, the projects listing should now NOT show any started units, as these will now be accessible via "My Units".                                                                                                                         
Re-organise the main menu into two groups (separated by a horizontal rule):                                                                                                                                                                       
- My Units                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
- Classes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
- Courses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
- My Projects                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
- Stacks                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
- Starter Packs

html:
Improvement was updated by Joel Moss in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 12:27.

codio-6341 My Units Created by Joel Moss
Most students do not start with real projects for quite a while. For this reason, we should not show projects by default, but Units.

Create a new main menu item called "My Units". When clicked, this should show a list of the current user's Units. This list should have no tabs, as it will show only the current user's started Units. Sorting and search options should remain.

Each Unit in this list should also show the Unit's image. If there are no unit for the current user, show thus default message "You have not started any units yet. Feel free to browse [our courses]() first."

Additionally, the projects listing should now NOT show any started units, as these will now be accessible via "My Units".

Re-organise the main menu into two groups (separated by a horizontal rule):

- My Units
- Classes
- Courses

- My Projects
- Stacks
- Starter Packs
Assignee AndreyNikitin → Unassigned
